Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️ 50 UAV AND AIRCRAFT MISSILE ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖ KILLED OUT on the ...
Description: Forwarded From Commander of the Military Forces Mykola Oleshchuk⚡️ 50 UAVs AND AIRCRAFT MISSILE KILLED➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖On September 21, 2024, the Russian occupiers struck Ukraine has two ballistic missiles -Iskander-M-/KN-23 from Voronezk region, a ceramic X-59/X-69 aircraft missile from the expanse of the Kursk region, and 69 attack UAVs of the -Shahed- type (launch areas - Primorsko-Akhtarsk, Yeisk, Kursk - Russian Federation). Zagalom radiotech by the nightly revolutions of the Revolutionary Forces a total of 72 targets were detected. The enemy's repeated attacks were repelled by aviation, anti-aircraft missile forces, radio-electronic warfare of the Airborne Forces and the destruction of mobile fire groups of the Ukrainian Defense Forces.💥 As a result of the anti-aircraft battle, 51 targets were shot down: one armored aircraft missile X-59/ X-69 and 50 attack UAVs -Shahed-131/136- near Khmelnitskaya, Poltava, Cherkasy, Kiev, Vinnytsia, Ivano-Frankivsk, Dnipropetrovsk, Mykolayiv, Odeska, Kherson , Donetsk, Kirovograd, Sumy and Chernihiv regions. 16 more guards The UAV was lost locally - it seemed to have fallen under the influx of radio-electronic agents from the virus. Information is being clarified. In addition, an attack drone detected a crossing of the sovereign cordon with the Republic of Belarus near the Chernihiv region, another Russian UAV turned back to its homeland - near the Belgorod region. One dangerous drone is found in the windy expanse of Cherkasy region. The battle robot is thrilling. I thank all the sky for the result!
